title: Driver’s room/sanitary block on podium and or parking floorother than mentioned in Regulation No
clause_text: Driver’s room/sanitary block on podium and or parking floorother than mentioned in Regulation No.31(1)(xxvi). Area of DG set room at stilt and podium level other than mentioned in Regulation No 31(1)(xxx)
section: The following shall be counted in FSI.
